name: Down we Go! (Sujal)
description:
This game is submission to Ninja Game Jame 2

Down we go was made within the limits of the jam.

How to play:

There is a character in every level who you can control, obviously not!

When you press Play, the platform under the player vanishes and player falls down. Oops! There are spikes down there.

You can place objects in the level as you wish to avoid the spikes.

Controls:

  • Click on the button to pick a block
  • Click in the world to place it
  • Right, Click to pick it up.

Installation:

  • Download the ZIP file, 
  • Extract the file contents
  • Run the application file

(Still Unfinished)

Working on the full release
